description: A radically fresh composition, dictated by a name that has the ring of a manifesto. That was the way François Demachy, Dior Perfumer-Creator, wanted it: raw and noble all at once. Natural ingredients, selected with extreme care, prevail in excessive doses. Radiant top notes burst with the juicy freshness of Reggio di Calabria Bergamot. Ambroxan, derived from precious ambergris, unleashes a powerfully woody trail. Sauvage is an act of creation inspired by wide-open spaces. An ozone blue sky sprawled above a rocky landscape, white-hot beneath the desert sun."To create Sauvage, I used man as my starting point. A strong and unmistakable masculinity. Like the image of a man who transcends time and fashion" - François Demachy, Dior Perfumer-CreatorFrançois Demachy likes the top notes of his men's fragrances to carry the snap of citrus. For the House of Dior, he chose an exclusive Bergamot that he shaped with local producers to obtain a "custom" signature. His Bergamot is like a whirlwind of juicy freshness that sweeps everything up in its path. Drenched in the Calabrian sun, it is fruitier and develops unique, zesty facets with a tinge of pepper. Sichuan Pepper is the finest in the world, releasing a spicy vibration with lemony and slightly camphoric accents. An ingredient of natural origin derived from the very precious ambergris, it unfurls its marine woody notes, as vivifying as the ocean spray. With the subtle attraction of sun-bleached driftwood, it plays and lingers, like tobacco-imbued background music that never fades. And leaves a distinguished trail.Fragrance Notes:Top Note - Reggio Bergamot; Heart Note - Sichuan Pepper; Base Note: AmbroxanClick Here to discover both ways to wear Sauvage
title: Sauvage Eau de Toilette

description: Singer, songwriter, rising star Shawn Mendes now brings his distinctive artistry to  Signature Eau de Parfum his debut fragrance for women and men. A scent that draws you in with a harmony of fresh citrus and radiant woody florals, touched with his native maple.Soulful, luminous and uplifting, it lingers in the air like a song. With undeniably addictive appeal, the fragrance is a nod to Shawn's Canadian roots with its rich and distinctive sugar maple accord heart. Opening with refreshing citrus notes, the scent evolves with an infusion of radiant florals, leaving a lasting woody impression.

description: Dolce&Gabbana The One For Men Eau de Parfum offers a deeper fragrance experience, the true connoisseur's choice. For the one who represents pure masculinity and sophistication, the scent is as striking and charismatic as he is. A highly intense fragrance to appeal to the most magnetic individual. The vibrant, elegant top notes of grapefruit, coriander and basil reveal the Oriental spicy signature of the fragrance. The heart of the scent captivates with its masculinity, with warm ginger and cardamon working alongside charming, sweet orange blossom. A base of rich, intense tobacco, sensual ambery notes and warm cedar wood ensure a deep and enduring impression of The One.Fragrance Notes:Top - Grapefruit, coriander, basil; Heart - Ginger, cardamon, sweet orange blossom; Base - Tobacco, ambery, cedar wood
title: The One For Men Eau de Parfum

description: Obsession for Men Eau de Toilette by Calvin Klein. Intense. Unforgettable. Provocative. Between love and madness lies Obsession. This spicy oriental is a provocative and compelling blend of herbs and rare woods.      Topnotes - Mandarin, bergamot     Midnotes - Lavender, myrrh, spices     Basenotes - Musk, sandalwood, patchouli
title: Obsession for Men Eau de Toilette

description: Acqua Di Gio Pour Homme Eau de Toilette Travel Spray by Giorgio Armani is a light and elegant scent for men that begins with mild citrus notes followed by aquatic mid notes. The scent finishes smoothly with woods notes of oak moss, satinwood, and amber. Sensuous and sparkling; cooled by the Mediterranean, warmed by the sun. An aura of marine notes, fruits, herbs and woods.
title: Acqua Di Gio Pour Homme Eau de Toilette Travel Spray

description: L'Homme Ultime Eau de Parfum by Yves Saint Laurent is for the man who leaves his mark. A duality of freedom and control. An audacious blend. The fresh sensuality of sage with the depth of aromatic woody notes creates an ultimately distinctive signature. The effortless leader by Yves Saint Laurent.Fragrance Notes:Top - Grapefruit oil, cardamom oil, ginger oil; Heart: Damascena rose oil, geranium oil, sclary sage oil; Base: Vetiver oil, cedarwood oil, labdanum resinoid
title: L'Homme Ultime Eau de Parfum

description: John Varvatos begins with top notes of medjool, date fruit, Mediterranean herbs, and tamarind leaves over spicy mid notes of coriander, clary sage, and ajowan. The scent closes on masculine basenotes of black leather, vanilla, balsams and amber.
title: John Varvatos Eau de Toilette Spray

description: A synthesis of the House’s heritage and commitment to luxury, Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme is the signature fragrance for the modern male icon - sensual, elegant and masculine.Top Note: Bergamot, Violet; Heart Note: Leather, Sweet Tobacco, Amber, Black pepper; Base Note: Patchouli, Cedarwood, Amyris
title: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Eau de Toilette

description: Pi is a celebration of what makes a man seductive - his intelligence, courage, and contributions. Pi is more than a name, it's a symbol. This woody Eau de Toilette with essence of iron wood and mandarin is a means of escape and a flight of discovery into new sensations.True to the legend of Pi, the composition of Givenchy's Eau de Toilette for men is powerful without being overwhelming. It is deliberately not light and citrusy. Intense and generous, Pi is a major statement in men's fragrance.Fragrance Notes:Top - Mandarin, galbanum; Heart - Infinium; Base - Benzoin, iron wood
title: Pi Eau de Toilette

description: L.12.12 Blanc Eau de Toilette by Lacoste is the inventiveness and elegance of the Lacoste polo shirt revisited in a fragrance. A pure and elegant fragrance to purvey a feeling of cleanness and freshness. Simple and chic bottle with piqué-style contours, with the iconic croc. Woody floral, cardamom tuberose, suede accord.
title: Eau de Lacoste L.12.12 Blanc Eau de Toilette Spray

description: Black begins with a zesty top note blend of mandarin, grapefruit and lemon followed by mid notes of mint, nutmeg, and lush greens. The scent ends on exotic notes of incense, suede, and musk.
title: Black for Men Eau de Toilette Spray

description: The House of Gucci takes as a catalyst its iconic entwined Gs and brings us a hero who regards this emblem as an incitement to subvert. Our protagonist carries his challenge to a new level with Gucci Guilty Intense. The spirit of hedonism that the Gucci Guilty man unleashes is intoxicating. His power resides in knowing that power is a game; a game he is ready to play.Top Note: Lavender, Lemon; Heart Note: Orange flower; Base Note: Cedarwood, Patchouli
title: Guilty Intense Pour Homme Eau de Toilette Spray

description: 1 Million Privé Eau de Parfum is an enhanced version of the original 1 Million Eau De Toilette that incorporates noble materials to take it from classic to unique. The heart is an extraordinary adventure of nargile tobacco enriched with precious Myrrh. Base notes of patchouli and Tonka bean absolute make the fragrance exciting and explosive!Fragrance Notes:Top - Marine accord, cardamom, mandarin, bergamot; Heart: Nargile tobacco, myrrh; Base: Patchouli, Tonka bean absolute
title: 1 Million Privé Eau de Parfum

description: Since Jean Paul Gaultier's first men's collection, he has shown men that they can indulge in the forbidden, and that a kilt or dress can be worn with virility. A reminder to them that nothing in life is totally black or white but always a blend. Just as he made the woman in a corset as the symbol and bottle of his feminine fragrance, Jean Paul Gaultier now transforms the man in a sailor's T-shirt into both the symbol and bottle of 'LE MALE'.
title: Le Male Eau de Toilette Spray

description: Mr. Burberry Eau de Parfum is an intense interpretation of the original Mr. Burberry, the fragrance captures the essence and anticipation of London at nighttime. A warm, sensual and woody scent with fresh and aromatic top notes of tarragon and comforting, spicy cinnamon, layered delicately on rich patchouli with a base of amber and smokey vetiver.The bottle honours the black Heritage Trench Coat and its signature design details. Bold and masculine, the weighted cap references horn-look buttons, while a hand-tied knot in English-woven gabardine sits around the neck, celebrating the innovative fabric invented by Thomas Burberry more than 100 years ago. The dark lacquer bottle conveys the sensuality and warmth of the scent.Fragrance Notes:Top - Fresh tarragon, spicy cinnamon; Heart - Rich patchouli, aromatic lavender; Base - Woody amber, smokey vetiver
title: Mr. Burberry Eau de Parfum

description: Stronger With You is the fragrance of a man that lives in the present, molded by the energy of modernity. Unpredictable, he surprises with his originality, just like its spicy accord - a mix of cardamom, pink peppercorn, and violet leaves. He has inherited a confident elegance, with the easy insouciance of youth, conveyed by the sage at his aromatic heart.Fragrance Notes:Top - Pink pepper; Middle - Sage; Base - Cedarwood
title: Emporio Armani Stronger With You Eau de Toilette

description: Encapsulation of BOSS in a bottle: Success through elegance and style.Top Note: Apple, citrus fruits; Heart Note: Geranium, cinnamon and cloves; Base Note: Sandalwood, vetiver, cedarwood, vanilla
title: Boss Bottled Eau de Toilette Spray

description: Get caught up in the game with this sensual, woody-oriental Eau de Toilette. Play Intense for Men Eau de Toilette Spray is a confident, warm blend of pink pepper, amyris wood and Tonka bean, created for passionate and assertive men who dare to seduce.Fragrance Notes:Top - Pink pepper; Heart - Amyris wood; Base -  Tonka bean
title: Play Intense for Men Eau de Toilette

description: The lighter version of your favorite scent, ck one Body Spray by Calvin Klein is the perfect way to refresh and re-energize yourself throughout the day.
catalogs: Fragrance, Women's Fragrance, Body Mist & Hair Mist
title: ck one Body Spray

description: Dive into the night with Nuit D'Issey by Issey Miyake. Elegance, strength and masculinity, the powerful force of natural attraction. The power of natural attraction with notes of bergamot, black pepper, vetiver, leather and black woods.
title: Nuit D'Issey Eau de Toilette

description: An elegant spicy fragrance tailored to make a lasting impression. Constructed like the Made to Measure suit: Each accord and ingredient lends texture and structure. The smoothest Provencal lavender echoes the luxurious silk lining of the suit; texture and elegance are achieved with juniper berry and Sri Lankan nutmeg, while the best Indonesian patchouli conveys the final luxurious signature, like the hand-embroidered label.
title: Made To Measure Eau de Toilette

description: Created for a man who defines his own masculinity, Gucci Guilty Absolute Pour Homme Eau de Parfum is a modern declaration of self expression and emancipated sexuality. Born out of a special collaboration between creative director Alessandro Michele and maître perfumeur Alberto Morillas, Gucci Guilty Absolute embodies the liberated man it is made for - an innovative expression of a men's woody scent.The master perfumer and Alessandro Michele share the same approach to their craft: an unceasing passion to create and to do so beyond the traditional rules. A leather hero ingredient is an homage to the ultimate Gucci material; while the flacon is finished with details inspired by the codes of a refined lounge; the sensorial textures and colors of cigars and cognac.#GuiltyNotGuiltyFragrance Notes:Top - Woodleather; Heart - Golden wood; Base - Trio of patchouli oils, vetiver
title: Guilty Absolute Pour Homme Eau de Parfum

description: Redolent of solar South African Red Tea, Eau Parfumée Au Thé Rouge by Bvlgari is a vibrant luxury Eau de Cologne for men and women. A solar fragrance with a flamboyant olfactive universe that creates an experience of absolute indulgence, conveying the warmth and fullness of sensual pleasure. Olfactory family: woody - LuminousFragrance Notes:Top: pink pepper, orange; Heart: red tea accord, fig pulp; Base: walnut, musk
title: Eau Parfumée Au Thé Rouge

description: Discover your inner HERO with the power of fresh mountain air accord and rich woods infused with black vanilla. MANKIND HERO Eau de Toilette spray, a courageous fragrance by Kenneth Cole, is the perfect balance of strength and warmth. Be the evolution.
title: MANKIND HERO Eau de Toilette

description: Polo Double Black begins with top notes of spiced mango and pepper followed by mid notes of roasted coffee and Indonesian Nutmeg. The scent finishes on notes of rich woods, cardamom and juniper berry.
title: Polo Double Black Eau de Toilette Spray

description: A sensual and masculine leather woody fragrance. A unique and contrasting signature, with a powerful enchanting trail. Fresh Sicilian mandarin notes, and the surprising combination of masculine wood and leather with an unprecedented violet accord. Creativity, distinction and character: the Fahrenheit signature is unique-manly yet subtle-for men with a love of freedom.
title: Fahrenheit Eau de Toilette

description: Chrome Intense by Azzaro electrifies the quiet strength of Chrome with the exhilarating freshness of iced mint, cardamom and vetiver.
title: Chrome Intense Eau de Toilette

description: Jimmy Choo Man Intense Eau de Toilette is a sensual fragrance, created for a powerful and daring seductive man with a rock'n'roll spirit'.Fragrance Notes:Top - Lavender, honeydew melon; Heart - Davana oil, black pepper; Dry Down - Cistus absolute, Tonka beans
title: Man Intense Eau de Toilette

description: The wild new way to wear fragrance. Uninhibited. Masculine. Fresh. Discover the new way to wear fragrance: an unbreakable bottle you can spray any way, take anywhere and apply any time. The air-powered system, an exclusive Dior innovation, is environmentally friendly. The Sauvage Eau de Toilette in a radically fresh interpretation. Spray generously to apply Sauvage Very Cool Spray at any time of day."Although Sauvage Very Cool Spray is a composition as 'direct' as the Eau de Toilette, I saw it as a way of highlighting Sauvage's structure. I wanted to reveal its framework and its essence, so that this search for lightness and freshness remained a strong signature." François DemachyReggio Bergamot: François Demachy likes the top notes of his men's fragrances to carry the snap of citrus. For the House of Dior, he chose an exclusive bergamot that he shaped with local producers to obtain a "custom" signature. His bergamot is like a whirlwind of juicy freshness that sweeps everything up in its path. Drenched in the Calabrian sun, it is fruitier and develops unique, zesty facets with a tinge of pepper.Sichuan Pepper: Sichuan pepper is the finest in the world, releasing a spicy vibration with lemony and slightly camphoric accents.Ambroxan: An ingredient of natural origin derived from the very precious ambergris, it unfurls its marine woody notes, as vivifying as the ocean spray. With the subtle attraction of sun-bleached driftwood, it plays and lingers, like tobacco-imbued background music that never fades. And leaves a distinguished trail.Fragrance Notes:Top - Reggio Bergamot; Heart - Sichuan Pepper; Base - AmbroxanClick Here to discover both ways to wear Sauvage
title: Sauvage Very Cool Spray Fresh Eau De Toilette

description: New York City is made of courageous, bold, fearless minds. Led by few and followed by many. Inspired by the boldness of New York life, Black Bold is a daring fragrance that pushes the boundaries with notes of strength, power, and confidence.Black Bold opens with a chilled blast of aromatic notes energized with a touch of tonic. Ancient cedar leaf is blended with ground nutmeg, and warmed with whispers of lotus flower and incense smoke. In the background, contrasting textures of soft and powerful come to life through elements of black and blonde woods balanced with suede, violet leaves and ambergris. Finally, lingering in the air is a dry down of leathery musks. Intense. Determined. Unexpected. Now is the moment to find your Bold.
title: Black Bold Eau de Parfum

description: Dolce & Gabbana dedicate their classic fragrance Pour Homme to the elegance and style of the Italian man. It is an olfactory portrait of the Latin lover, able to project into the collective imagination the iconic power of irresistible sex appeal and tenderness. At the heart of the scent, Lavender provides a soul of pure, dry freshness, like a Mediterranean breeze, while Cedarwood lends it its masculine structure.Top notes: Neroli, Bergamot, Mandarin; Heart notes: Lavender, Sage, Pepper; Base notes: Sandalwood,  Tobacco, Tonka bean
title: Pour Homme Eau de Toilette

description: Shift into overdrive with Ralph Lauren Polo Red Intense Eau de Parfum. A fiery rush of red ginger, red leather and red roasted coffee. Invigorating. Intoxicating. Addictive.Top Notes: Red Ginger; Mid Notes: Red Leather; Base Notes: Red Roasted Coffee
title: Polo Red Intense Eau de Parfum

description: Brit Rhythm is about the energy of living for the moment. Inspired by live music, natural energy, excitement and raw talent, the Brit Rhythm man is free of restriction, Unpolished and instinctive, it moves into the spotlight with a burst of adrenaline.
title: Brit Rhythm Eau de Toilette Spray

description: Chrome Pure is the promise of new horizons, a quest shared by generations of men. Refined, clean and memorable Chrome Pure is a modern and vibrant scent. A new adventure for men who choose to live, laugh and love, in other words, to celebrate life.Fragrance Notes: Mandarin, Akigalawood, Tonka
title: Chrome Pure Eau de Toilette

description: Intensify your power of seduction. L'Homme Intense, a mascule addition from Yves Saint Laurent features a provocative blend of woody, aromatic notes wrapped in a sensual suede accord. The magnetic power of L'homme, now even more irresistible.
title: L'Homme Intense

description: Armani Code Profumo Eau de Parfum by Giorgio Armani encompasses the masculine and sensual intensity of Armani Code, built around the addictive Tonka bean note. With a warm and glowing amber accord, Code Profumo introduces a new opulence to the contemporary classic. Its key notes of Tonka bean, cardamom, and woody amber are addictive, explosive, and rich.Fragrance Notes:Top - Woody, ambery accord; Middle - Tonka bean; Base - Cardamom
title: Armani Code Profumo Eau de Parfum

description: A*Men Kryptomint is for a hero in search of strong sensations and of outstanding capacities! Like a powerful star, this fragrance will restore his energy instantaneously. It is a superior power sensation for the man pushing himself to excellence and new challenges.Fresh. Vibrant. Legendary.Fragrance Notes: Peppermint, Egyptian geranium and patchouli. Click here for store locations
title: A*Men Kryptomint Eau de Toilette

description: John Varvatos Vintage begins with top notes of bergamot, quince, juniper and citron over spicy mid notes of black pepper, pink pepper, and suede. The scent finishes on a dry base of oak moss, cedar, patchouli, and tonka bean
title: Vintage Eau de Toilette

description: Independent. Spirited. Self-assured. He's all man. Strong, handsome, a risk taker and thrill seeker. He never thought about commitment - until he met her. She intoxicates him. He's changed. He can't resist and doesn't want to. An exhilarating first impression captivates with the unexpected freshness of spicy ginger, coconut water, and star anise. the heart pulsates with notes of crisp starfruit, cedarleaf, and patchouli. A bold masculine signature of exotic moroccan cedarwood, tonka bean and Madagascar vanilla linger with vibrant sensuality.Fragrance Notes:Top: Ginger, coconut water, star anise; Heart: Star fruit, cedarleaf, patchouli; Dry: Moroccan cedar wood, tonka bean, madagascar vanilla
title: Eternity NOW Men Eau de Toilette

description: An intense, more sensual version of Armani Code Men with increased leather notes.  Seductive, Dangerous, Contagious, Oriental. Featuring leather and amber accord, precious woods, and tonka bean.
title: Armani Code Ultimate Eau de Toilette

description: Michael Kors Extreme Blue Eau de Toilette: For the man who knows no limits, no bounds. A definition of modern urban masculinity with a dynamic tension of sleek freshness and sensual musks.
title: Extreme Blue Eau de Toilette

description: Euphoria Men Intense Eau de Toilette by Calvin Klein. Rich. Bold. Addictive. An oriental amber fragrance that blends deep woodsy and richer spices - the sexier, more mysterious side of the Euphoria Men.     Topnotes - Ginger Pepper Cocktail, Raindrop Accord, Chilled Sudachi     Midnotes - Black Basil, Cedar Leaf, Hydroponic Sage     Basenotes - Labdanum, Vetiver, Oud, Solid Amber
title: Euphoria Men Intense Eau de Toilette

description: Wanna Live? Just Play! Extremely modern yet totally timeless, Play offers a multi-sensorial experience centered around the warm & sensual amyris wood. The Play Man is always true to himself. He exhibits a studied, casual elegance without forethought. Play for Men is a woody-fresh fragrance that sparkles with bitter orange and grapefruit mingled with amaris wood and vetiver. Get caught up in the game and play!Fragrance Notes:Top - Bitter orange, grapefruit; Heart - Amyris wood; Base -  Vetiver
title: Play for Men Eau de Toilette

description: An explosion of adrenaline and exaggerated opulence with a refreshing inhibition. 1 Million Cologne Eau de Toilette by Paco Rabanne is an episode of luxurious delirium, provoking a sophisticated but effortless attitude. This chapter of the 1 Million story is no longer about  having it all, but showing the most extravagant facet and having fun!Top Notes: Marine accord, Cardamom, Mandarin, Bergamot; Heart Notes: Rose, Cinnamon, Juniper Berries; Base Notes: Leather, Tonka Beans, Patchouli
title: 1 Million Cologne Eau de Toilette

description: Polo Blue is a light and casual scent featuring notes of cucumber, pepper, suede, and basil
title: Polo Blue Body Spray

description: Bvlgari's Man in Black Eau de Parfum is a Neo-Oriental eau de parfum with a sophisticated, totally unexpected signature. Man in Black Eau de Parfum expresses virile strength and irresistible seduction in equal measure.Top Notes: A brilliant, spicy amber-rum accord. Luminous, vibrant, addictive.; Heart Notes: A tuberose-iris-leather accord. Sophisticated, magnetic, aristocratic.; Dry Down: Intense black amber (benzoin, tonka bean, guaiac wood resin). Mesmerizing, appealing, caressing.
title: Man in Black Eau de Parfum

description: Aramis begins with a spicy herbal blast of artemisia, juniper, cumin and clove followed quickly by mid notes of leather, lavender, carnation, geranium and jasmine. What defines Aramis are the base notes which are present in the scent from start to finish.
title: Aramis Eau de Toilette Spray

description: BOSS THE SCENT INTENSE FOR HIM INTENSE is a seductive Eau de Parfum for Men. Masculine, powerful and memorable, the new intensified fragrance BOSS THE SCENT FOR HIM features a higher oil concentration and amplified aphrodisiac ingredients to enhance the power of his seduction journey. BOSS THE SCENT INTENSE FOR HIM is built around the rousing maninka fruit and set on a virile leather base combined with vanilla. The effect is crafted to provoke the senses with an air of depth and enigma, its notes unfolding over time to reveal its incredible potency the closer you get.It opens on a fresh and spicy top note of Ginger, intensified by green Cardamom which gives the perfume a stimulating energy. At the heart, the aphrodisiac maninka fruit, an exclusive ingredient from South Africa, has been intensified to shape an even more powerful and memorable impression with its rich and complex facets that envelop the skin in sensuality. The addition of vanilla at the base, combined with the richness of burnished leather, increases the scent's magnetic strength, which lingers like an unforgettable memory. The flacon presents an evocative and darker amber juice, set in a metallic cage, as if capturing the spirit of seduction before it unleashes its dynamic power.Fragrance Notes:Top - Ginger, cardamom; Heart - Maninka fruit; Base - Leather
title: BOSS THE SCENT FOR HIM INTENSE Eau De Parfum

description: Lacoste Essential is about freedom to play & enjoy life.Top Note: Fresh, aquatic circus, tangerine, bergamot, tomato leaves and cassis; Heart Note: Spicy floral, black pepper and rose; Base Note: Patchouli, Sandalwood and wood accord
title: Essential Eau de Toilette Spray

description: Seduction takes on a new shade with La Nuit De L'Homme L'Intense Eau de Parfum by Yves Saint Laurent. The ultimate sophistication, housed in a bottle which combines the red intensity of seduction with the elegant black of night.Sage and violet are blended with a vertiginous blast of iris concrete, combined with the Oriental signature of the original La Nuit De L'Homme; vanilla, patchouli and Tonka bean. The night never ends.Fragrance Notes:Top - Iris concrete; Middle - Tonka bean; Base - Cardamom
title: La Nuit De L'Homme L'Intense Eau de Parfum

description: Gucci Pour Homme II is the essence of young, masculine sensuality. It is an expression of free-spirited style and a playful attitude - the Gucci Pour Homme II man is charismatic and effortlessly seductive.Top Note: Bergamot, Violet leaves; Heart Note: Pimento, Black Tea, Cinnamon; Base Note: Olive wood, Tobacco leaves, Musk, Myrrh
title: Pour Homme II Eau de Toilette Spray

description: Calvin Klein Eternity for Men Intense Eau de Toilette rediscovers and deepens the passion that sparked the epic love story at the heart of the Eternity fragrance. Fresh. woody. aromatic.Fragrance Notes:Top - Grapefruit, white pepper, black tea; Middle - Lavender, geranium, rhubarb; Bottom - Vetivier, cedarwood smoley resin
title: Eternity for Men Intense Eau de Toilette

description: BLVGARI Aqva Pour Homme is an aromatic aquatic woody fragrance perfectly at one with nature. Notes consist of:Top Note: Mandarin, Petit Grain; Heart Note: Santolina, Posidonia; Base Note: Mineral Amber
title: Aqva Pour Homme Eau de Toilette Spray

description: A light and playful scent that's equally elegant and sophisticated. The freesia and lavender notes evoke a clean, fresh, almost watery aroma. The blend of cinnamon and cedar call attention to its spice. And finally, at the base, a blend of sandalwood and amber give this cologne its enduring, yet understated strength.
title: Burberry for Men Eau de Toilette

description: Speed. Adrenaline. Seduction. Ralph Lauren Polo Red is a fiery blend of spicy red saffron, fresh red grapefruit and deep redwood that ignites the thrill-seeker in every man.
title: Polo Red Body Spray

description: Elegant, sophisticated and contemporary, BVLGARI MAN is a distinctive, sensual everyday fragrance which embodies masculine charisma.Fragrance Notes:Top - Bergamot & white pear; Middle - Cashmere wood & vetiver; Bottom - Tonka bean and musk.
title: Bvlgari Man Eau de Toilette

description: Artisan Acqua a fragrance for men. John Varvatos Artisan Acqua combines an invigorating citrus blend with accents of spices and herbs for a unique woody aroma, embodying the confidence, creativity, and passion of the modern man.
title: Artisan Acqua Eau de Toilette

description: The elegance of simplicity. Pure and radical, the Cologne freshness is recreated with a grapefruit blossom base. Its enveloping trail reflects the casual charm of a timeless white dress shirt. Not ostentatious, but stylish. The elegance of simplicity with a skin scent, just for you. Dior Homme eschews every masculine cliché. It explores a new virility, immediate yet complex.Fragrance Notes: Calabrian bergamot, Moroccan grapefruit blossom, white musk.
title: Dior Homme

description: Prada Man begins with notes of orange blossom, saffron oil, and geranium on top of mid notes of labdanum, incense, vetiver, and patchouli. The scent is defined by sensual base notes of amber, myrrh, tonka bean, leather and sandalwood.
title: Prada Man Eau de Toilette Spray

description: A fragrance for the modern-day gentlemen. Being a gentleman is all about attitude. It's a way of life. Gentlemen Only is a modern, elegant woody neo-aromatic Eau de Toilette infused with rich green, spice and wood notes that exudes an unsettling sensuality. It's a fragrance designed for the modern-day gentlemen. Woody neo aromatic.Fragrance Notes:Top - Green mandarin, pink pepper, nutmeg, birchleaf; Heart - Cedar wood, heart of patchouli, vetiver; Base - Skin accord
title: Gentlemen Only Eau de Toilette

description: Whether he's in the air, on the water or behind the wheel, Michael Kors For Men Eau de Toilette Spray is the essential luxury for the man who is always on the move. For the ultimate jet setter, this fragrance is the perfect balance of urban sophistication and jet set style, giving him the confidence to take on any landscape, no matter where the day takes him. Michael Kors For Men Eau de Toilette Spray is an essential luxury for the man on the move, combining the rugged yet refined scent of patchouli and suede with signature spices to evoke a luxurious freshness.
title: For Men Eau de Toilette Spray

description: A fresh energetic and relaxed wooded trail. Like a gust of freedom, the energetic freshness of Sicilian lemon and the woody scent of Virginia cedar embellish the powdery signature of Tuscan iris. A casual composition that is worn in the same way as a t-shirt over a perfectly cut pair of jeans. Dior Homme eschews every masculine cliché. It explores a new virility, immediate yet complex.
title: Homme Sport Eau de Toilette

description: Polo Black begins with notes of iced mango, Spanish sage, green effervescent accord, silver armoise, lush liquid accord, hedione, patchouli noir, sandalwood, timberol, tonka bean.
title: Polo Black Travel Fragrance

description: L'Eau D'Issey Pour Homme Eau de Toilette Fraîche is a powerful, ultra-masculine and sophisticated fragrance. It contains strong freshness with grapefruit essence, energy with facets of marine accord, and strength and texture with white patchouli and vetiver. Opens and introduces sparkling airy water, a symbol of energy, with notes of grapefruit, marine accord and vetiver.
title: L'Eau D'Issey Pour Homme Eau de Toilette Fraîche

description: Lacoste Pour Homme is a fresh fragrance with a sophisicated edge for more mature and  refined men.Top Note: Italian bergamot, ruby grapefruit, plum and apple fuse; Heart Note: Juniper, cardamom, pink peppercorn and cinnamon; Base Note: Rum, Sandalwood, vanilla and musk
title: Pour Homme Eau de Toilette Spray

description: Nautica Voyage begins with top notes of green leaf and apple, followed by a mid note blend of sailcloth accord, mimosa, and water lotus. Base notes of cedar wood, musk, moss and woody amber finish the scent.
title: Online Only Voyage On The Go Spray

description: MANKIND Kenneth Cole - The bold aromatic fragrance for the modern man, who is defined by his own expectations. Be the Evolution.
title: MANKIND Eau de Toilette Spray

description:
Only at ULTA!

Ignite the fiery passion of seduction with this intense celebration of exotic raw materials, expert craftsmanship and luxury. Spicy, aromatic and bold, Azzaro Pour Homme Intense captures the powerful flavors of sophistication to create homage to sensual temptation.
title: Azzaro Pour Homme Intense Eau de Parfum

description: Reaction by Kenneth Cole is a masculine scent based around a fresh note of lime. Notes of pepper, watery freesia, leather, oak moss, and patchouli give the scent balance and a classic finish.
title: Reaction for Men Eau de Toilette Spray

description: Fragrance evokes the thrill of victory. Lacoste Essential Sport features notes of geranium, green splash accord, pink grapefruit and Lacoste Essential Sport is about freedom to play & enjoy life.
title: Essential Sport Eau de Toilette Spray

description: COACH FOR MEN Eau de Toilette takes you on a journey of endless possibilities, evoking a sense of freedom that comes from the energy and spontaneity of New York City. A modern fragrance which combines fresh, energetic top notes and a skin-like warm sensuality in the amber, woody base notes.Masculine yet refined, the fragrance starts with cool, fresh green Nashi pear, contrasted with spicy cardamom, and finishes with a textured vetiver base note, creating an aromatic, woody scent. The bottle design is emblematic of the Coach brand and features several iconic codes: turnlock, hangtag, carriage logo engraving.Fragrance Notes:Top - Green nashi pear; Middle - Spicy cardamom; Base - Textured vetiver
title: COACH FOR MEN Eau de Toilette

description: Sophisticated. Refined. Modern. The first fragrance for men from Jimmy Choo. Jimmy Choo MAN Eau de Toilette is a powerfully fresh and modern fougere fragrance, created for a confident and refined man with a rebellious spirit. description: The Ultimate Pre-Shaving & Cleansing Device for Men:A sophisticated device that truly meets the needs of a man's skin, the LUNA for Men helps prep you for a closer, smoother and more comfortable shaving experience. It is offered in stylish black with thick silicone touch points that suit the characteristics of a man's skin, making it an essential grooming accessory that delivers genuine results.Pre-Shaving Conditioning: The LUNA for MEN preps the skin for a closer, smoother shave, resulting in an amazingly comfortable shaving experience.T-Sonic Cleansing Technology: T-Sonic technology refers to transdermal sonic pulses; generating thousands of pulsations per minute, the LUNA for Men cleanses deeply, gently unclogging pores of impurities and promoting smooth, revitalized-looking skin.Anti-Aging Mode: In Anti-Aging Mode, synchronous pulsations remove dry looking skin cells, lessen the visibility of expression lines and wrinkles, delivering a healthier-, younger- looking complexion.The main difference between the LUNA and the LUNA for Men are their brush surfaces. The LUN is available in 3 models to suit the specific characteristics of certain skin types, while the LUNA for Men's brush surface consists of broader silicone touch-points that channel T-Sonic pulsations more directly in order to refresh men's thicker and oilier skin.Unique Silicone Skincare Brush: The LUNA for Men's broad, rounded silicone touch points channel powerful T-Sonic pulsations through men's thicker skin more directly to effectively remove dirt. And as silicone is nonporous. This helps in keeping the tool clean.Versatile & Convenient: Fully waterproof. Immersible for 30 minutes at a depth of 1 meter. With a sealed charging port, the device is incredibly easy to clean. And because it's suitable for use in the shower, the LUNA for Men fits effortlessly into any morning routine.Sleek Design & Lasting Value; Compact, self-standing form; 400 full uses per each USB charge; No replacement brushes required; Long life span with 2-Year manufacturer Warranty & 10-Year Quality Guarantee through the manufactuer; Storage Bag; Waterproof
title: Online Only LUNA Men-Black

description: New package is a refillable "roll-on" with an improved formula. The package has four parts; a reservoir that holds the product, a roll-on ball sleeve into which the product reservoir screws so the roll-on can be used, a cap that tightly seals the reservoir during shipping, travel and while it sits on a shelf waiting to be sold, and a cap over the roll-on ball.SAVE THE RESERVOIR CAP for travel to assure there is no leakage into luggage.Not only is the package airline legal but it can easily be refilled from a standard Tend Skin Liquid bottle. This means you can save money by purchasing the large size Tend Skin Liquid bottle and using it to fill the roll on package.Now you have the benefits of using Tend Skin Liquid with the convenience of a roll-on that minimizes product waste. No more cotton balls or peeling fingers! This solution can be used for many irritations to the skin such as:Razor bumps; Ingrown hairs; Razor Burn; After electrolysis/waxing; Works as an under arm deodorant; Works as a foot deodorant; Can be used after facials for hair "extraction" soothing; Necktie redness; After laser hair removal to help sooth the redness
